Package org.spdx.tools.schema

package org.spdx.tools.schema
This package contains classes implementing tools for managing various schemas for the SPDX documents. Current schemas supported include: - RDF/OWL in RDF/XML format - JSON Schema Draft 7 - JSON LD (Linked Data)
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.spdx.tools
     
    org.spdx.tools.compare
    Classes related to the Compare SPDX Docs utilities
  • Class
    Description
    AbstractOwlRdfConverter
    Abstract class for implementing classes which convert from RDF/XML OWL format to some other format
    OwlToJsonContext
    Convert OWL RDF schema to a JSON Context file
    OwlToJsonSchema
    Converts from RDF/OWL RDF/XML documents to JSON Schema draft 7
    OwlToXsd
    Converts from OWL RDF/XML to XML Schema (XSD)
    SchemaException
    Exception thrown for schema-related errors
